alert.note: Alert for Ozark; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:32AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN OZARK AND EASTERN TANEY COUNTIES THROUGH 715 AM CDT... At 632 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taneyville to 8 miles east of Forsyth to near Diamond City. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals Lake, Taneyville, Theodosia, Pontiac, Wasola, Sundown, Noble, Brownbranch, Protem, Thornfield, Rueter, Bradleyville, Long Run and Isabella. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
